text: Brandon Anthony Micah Bernard (July 3, 1980 â€“ December 10, 2020) was an American man who was convicted for the 1999 robbery, kidnapping, and murder of two people. He was sentenced to death for the murders and remained on death row until his execution in December 2020. Bernard was a gang member. In 1999, Bernard was one of five gang members who together robbed, kidnapped, and murdered two youth pastors. After forcing the pastors into the trunk of their car, Christopher Andre Vialva shot both in the head before Bernard set the car on fire with the victims inside. Vialva was executed on September 24, 2020, and Bernard was executed on December 10, 2020. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:2020 deaths Category:African-American people Category:American burglars Category:American kidnappers Category:American people executed for murder Category:American robbers Category:Criminals from Texas Category:People executed by lethal injection Category:People from San Antonio, Texas
